content.question: In lines 2-3 (Navita . . . ripae), we learn that the

choices.label: travelers approach the shore through a grove
boat was shipwrecked by a huge wave
ferryman looks at the travelers and falls silent
Stygian wave washes up on Aeneasâ€™ foot

content.answer: travelers approach the shore through a grove
